metadata.name: Mandala #1
metadata.description:
My mandalas are a world full of mystery, colors, and wonder, in each of them you can find a story and meaningful shapes and patterns placed in the circle of colors, you can travel in the world of my mandalas and discover the stories yourselves

Aryans is composed of the symbols of ancient Iran, Cyrus the Great and the Queen, fish, bird, butterflys , cat, flowers and leaves. The eye in the center is a symbol of the hope of the people of my land for better days.
